text: Ra jo muhajiraharu tatha ansaraharu (apravasi tatha sthaniya sahayogi manisa) satmargama agrasarata dekha'eka chan ra jasale sathama rahi tiniharuko anusarana gare, allaha tiniharusita khusi cha ra tiniharu pani allahasita prasanna chan tiniharuko nimti yasta bagaincaharu tayara chan jasako tala naharaharu bagirahane chan (tiniharu) sadhaim tyasama basa garnechan. Yahi thulo saphalata ho
